item.title: Cisco Steps In Front Of The Video Parade
item.description:
John Naisbitt, a renowned futurist, once said that true leadership involves recognizing a trend and positioning oneself at its forefront. Cisco seems to have taken this to heart by acquiring Flip Video, the company behind the wildly popular camcorder line. It appears Cisco sees consumer-generated video as a growing trend and intends to lead the charge. But what exactly are their plans? To understand Cisco’s strategy, it’s crucial to examine the Flip video camera’s impact on the camcorder market...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cisco-steps-in-front-of-the-video-parade/
